Reviews.Title: adorable
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I have a smart phone now, it's black sleek and yknow...smart. All the apps are great and all but i find myself missing the cool smooth surface of this flip phone, messing with the little red lights into my own designs or changing the light pattern on the front. I remember lying in bed listening to the music with the front LED flashing allover my ceiling. I'm still looking for this phone now, it broke one day after mopping the floors at work, sliding out of my pocket and crashing into two pieces on the floor, broke my heart when it broke. I love this phone so much ):

Reviews.Title: Ice Cream Phone
Reviews.Author: Lisa L. Lassiter
Reviews.Content: The phone freezes and the only way to solve the problem is to R&R; battery. Have been unable to view pix that have been sent.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: tokki
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived on time and the condition of the phone was great. It was neatly and carefully packed as well. Loving my new phone it's simple and easy to use on daily bases, and it's pink! Great and quick service.
